tool.name: Trinity
tool.description: De novo assembly of RNA-Seq data Using Trinity
tool.command:
trinityToolWrapper.py Trinity.pl --JM $JM --CPU $CPU
## Inputs. #if str($inputs.paired_or_single) == "paired": --left $inputs.left_input --right $inputs.right_input #if $inputs.left_input.ext == 'fa': --seqType fa #else: --seqType fq #end if #if str($inputs.library_type) != "None": --SS_lib_type $inputs.library_type #end if --group_pairs_distance $inputs.group_pairs_distance #else: --single $inputs.input #if str($inputs.input.ext) == 'fa': --seqType fa #else: --seqType fq #end if #if str($inputs.library_type) != "None": --SS_lib_type $inputs.library_type #end if #end if
## Additional parameters. #if str($additional_params.use_additional) == "yes": --min_kmer_cov $inputs.min_kmer_cov --max_reads_per_graph $inputs.max_reads_per_graph --bflyHeapSpaceMax $input.bflyHeapSpaceMax #if $inputs.bfly_opts != 'None': --bfly_opts " $inputs.bfly_opts " #end if #end if
## direct to output > $trinity_log

param.name: JM
param.label: JM
param.help: Amount of memory to allocate to Jellyfish for Kmer catalog construction

param.name: CPU
param.label: CPU
param.help: Number of CPUs to use by Trinity

param.name: group_pairs_distance
param.label: Group pairs distance
param.help: Maximum length expected between fragment pairs

param.name: path_reinforcement_distance
param.label: Path reinforcement distance
param.help: Minimum read overlap required for path extension in the graph

param.name: path_reinforcement_distance
param.label: Path reinforcement distance
param.help: Minimum read overlap required for path extension in the graph

param.name: min_kmer_cov
param.label: inchworm_min_kmer_cov
param.help: Minimum kmer coverage required by Inchworm for initial contig construction

param.name: max_reads_per_graph
param.label: chrysalis_max_reads_per_graph
param.help: Maximum number of reads to be anchored within each transcript graph by Chrysalis

param.name: bfly_opts
param.label: bfly_opts
param.help: Options to pass on to Butterfly

param.name: bflyHeapSpaceMax
param.label: bflyHeapSpaceMax
param.help: Java heap space maximum value for Butterfly

tool.help:
Trinity is a de novo transcript assembler that uses RNA-seq data as input. This tool runs all Trinity_ commands--Inchworm, Chrysalis, and Butterfly--in a single pass.
.. _Trinity: http://trinityrnaseq.sourceforge.net
